text: "Starlight" is a 2006 song by Muse and is the second single from their fourth studio album Black Holes and Revelations. It went to the top 30 in Belgium, France, Ireland, Italy, Norway, Switzerland and the United Kingdom. It also peaked at number 46 in Australia and number 69 in Canada. == Track listings == === 7" picture disc === # "Starlight" – 3:59 # "Supermassive Black Hole" (Phones Control Voltage Mix) – 4:19 === CD === # "Starlight" – 3:59 # "Easily" – 3:40 === DVD === # "Starlight" (video) – 4:07 # "Starlight" (audio) – 3:59 # "Starlight" (making of the video) # "Hidden Track" == References == Category:2006 songs Category:Muse songs
title: Starlight (Muse song)
